title: Trends in Distance Education Research and Language Learning Design Simulations

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Experience in Remote Education Operations and Understanding of Fundamental Language Education Concepts
context.additional_context: Simulation-based learning environments for workplace language proficiency enhancement linked to job tasks

learning_goals: Learners can analyze five key trend keywords in distance education research and apply them to language learning design.
Learners can evaluate and compare three language education design models in VR simulation environments.
Learners can propose language learning design plans (research tools, participant types, etc.) based on research data.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
